_header: Saint Hippolytus the martyr knight was of great honour
Subjects: saints’ lives; Hippolytus, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Hippolytus in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
Seyn Ipolit þe martir knyȝt was of gret honurþat
                    seynt laurence In person wuste þoru heste of þe
                    emperour…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde we ȝerne seynt Ipolit þat he our erande
                    bedeþat god habbe mercy of ous & of alle þat habbeþ
                    nede

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint yppolit þe marter kniȝt was of gret honourÞat
                    seint laurence in prisoun kepte þorw heste of þe
                    emperour…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…bring vs to þat blisse þat lesteþ euermorefor
                    þe loue of seint Ipolit þat penaunce þoled sore

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Ypolyt þe Martir kniht was wiþ gret honourÞat
                    seint Laurence in prisun wuste þorwh heste of þe
                    Emperour…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we seint Ypolyt þat he vre erende
                    beodeÞat God haue merci of vs alle and of alle þat habbeþ
                    neode. Amen.
